original_title: National Chamber hosts B2B meeting with Norwegian company
original_body_lines: National Chamber President Deepal Nelson (left) and Senior Deputy President Anura Warnakulasooriya with buyers from Norway
Sri Lankan exporters meeting and presenting their samples to Norway buyers
The National Chamber of Commerce recently hosted a B2B meeting with a Norwegian company exploring the sourcing of Sri Lankan products.

Senior Consultant Svein Olav Agnalt, with his business partner from Norsk Dekor AS of Norway, visited the National Chamber of Commerce of Sri Lanka at the invitation of Senior Deputy President Anura Warnakulasooriya. The B2B meetings were with Sri Lankan exporters of textiles, apparel and customisable gift items.
Sixteen Sri Lankan exporters participated and presented their samples, products and the Norwegian buyers expressed much enthusiasm for the quality of products presented.

The buyers were received by National Chamber President Deepal Nelson, Senior Deputy President Anura Warnakulasooriya and Secretary General/CEO Bandula Dissanayake to discuss potential opportunities between their respective industries. B2B meetings (online) between Norsk Dekor AS and Sri Lankan potential exporters are expected to be arranged soon for those who could not attend the meeting physically.
